text: Rüdiger Rehm (born 22 November 1978) is a German former footballer. He is currently manager of FC Ingolstadt. ==Managerial statistics== Managerial record by team and tenure Team From To Record Sonnenhof Großaspach 29 June 2012 27 October 2014 Sonnenhof Großaspach 25 February 2015 15 June 2016 Arminia Bielefeld 15 June 2016 22 October 2016 Wehen Wiesbaden 13 February 2017 25 October 2021 FC Ingolstadt 8 December 2021 31 January 2023 Total — ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Arminia Bielefeld managers Category:German football managers Category:SG Sonnenhof Großaspach managers
title: Rüdiger Rehm
